Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.boards

Class ThreePlayersBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.boards.BoardFactory
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.boards.ThreePlayersBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ThreePlayersBoard extends BoardFactory
Represents a Board, it has a bitmask specific for when the maxPlayerNumber is three
See Also:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ThreePlayersBoard()
    Creates the board, resetting the itemsBag since it's a singleton, inherited from a previous match played on the server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean[][]
    createBitMask()
    Along with the TwoPlayerBoard's bitMask created by super.createBitMask(), it adds valid slots for when the maxPlayerNumber is three

    • createBitMask

      public boolean[][] createBitMask()
      Along with the TwoPlayerBoard's bitMask created by super.createBitMask(), it adds valid slots for when the maxPlayerNumber is three
